DOC.brief_summary: We study whether an increased proportion of omega-3-fatty acids (contained in fish oil) in the nutrition of critically ill patients reduces systemic inflammation.
DOC.brief_title: The Benefit of Adding Fish Oil to the Nutrition of Critically Ill Patients
DOC.criteria: indication for parenteral nutrition hypertriglyceridemia coagulation disorder decompensated liver cirrhosis or acute liver failure
